dinner.name: Chicken Karahi
recipe: Marinate the chicken with yogurt/spices (if used) for 15-30 minutes (optional).
Chop onions, tomatoes and other fresh ingredients as needed.
Heat oil/ghee in a large pan or pot over medium heat.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add the chicken and cook until it changes color/seals (for meat) or becomes tender (for vegetables).
Add tomatoes (fresh or puree) and cook until oil separates or tomatoes soften.
Stir in yogurt/cream/nut paste and simmer to develop a creamy sauce.
Add spices, salt and adjust seasoning; cover and simmer until everything is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander, mint or fried onions as desired and serve hot.
Approx. cook time: 30-40 mins.

dinner.name: Chicken Pulao
recipe: Rinse the rice until water runs clear and soak for 20-30 minutes.
Marinate the chicken with yogurt/spices (if used) for 15-30 minutes (optional).
Chop onions, tomatoes and other fresh ingredients as needed.
Heat oil/ghee in a large pan or pot over medium heat.

Garnish with fresh coriander, mint or fried onions as desired and serve hot.

recipe: Rinse the rice until water runs clear and soak for 20-30 minutes.

Heat oil/ghee in a large pan or pot over medium heat.

Add spices, salt and adjust seasoning; cover and simmer until everything is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander, mint or fried onions as desired and serve hot.

dinner.name: Masoor Biryani
recipe: Rinse the rice until water runs clear and soak for 20-30 minutes.
Chop onions, tomatoes and other fresh ingredients as needed.
Heat oil/ghee in a large pan or pot over medium heat.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Drain the soaked rice and add it to the pot with measured water/broth; bring to a boil.
Add tomatoes (fresh or puree) and cook until oil separates or tomatoes soften.
Stir in yogurt/cream/nut paste and simmer to develop a creamy sauce.
Layer/cook the rice with the cooked gravy/meat, cover tightly and cook on low heat (dum) until rice is done.
Add spices, salt and adjust seasoning; cover and simmer until everything is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander, mint or fried onions as desired and serve hot.
Approx. cook time: 45-60 mins.

Chop onions, tomatoes and other fresh ingredients as needed.
Heat oil/ghee in a large pan or pot over medium heat.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add the chicken and cook until it changes color/seals (for meat) or becomes tender (for vegetables).
Stir in yogurt/cream/nut paste and simmer to develop a creamy sauce.
Layer/cook the rice with the cooked gravy/meat, cover tightly and cook on low heat (dum) until rice is done.
Add spices, salt and adjust seasoning; cover and simmer until everything is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander, mint or fried onions as desired and serve hot.
Approx. cook time: 45-60 mins.

Heat oil/ghee in a large pan or pot over medium heat.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add the chicken and cook until it changes color/seals (for meat) or becomes tender (for vegetables).
Stir in yogurt/cream/nut paste and simmer to develop a creamy sauce.
Add spices, salt and adjust seasoning; cover and simmer until everything is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander, mint or fried onions as desired and serve hot.
Approx. cook time: 20-25 mins.

recipe: Rinse the rice until water runs clear and soak for 20-30 minutes.
Chop onions, tomatoes and other fresh ingredients as needed.

Add spices, salt and adjust seasoning; cover and simmer until everything is cooked through.

lunch.name: Plain Boiled Rice
recipe: Rinse the rice until water runs clear and soak for 20-30 minutes.
Chop onions, tomatoes and other fresh ingredients as needed.
Heat oil/ghee in a large pan or pot over medium heat.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Drain the soaked rice and add it to the pot with measured water/broth; bring to a boil.
Layer/cook the rice with the cooked gravy/meat, cover tightly and cook on low heat (dum) until rice is done.
Add spices, salt and adjust seasoning; cover and simmer until everything is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander, mint or fried onions as desired and serve hot.
Approx. cook time: 15-20 mins.

Chop onions, tomatoes and other fresh ingredients as needed.
Heat oil/ghee in a large pan or pot over medium heat.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Drain the soaked rice and add it to the pot with measured water/broth; bring to a boil.
Stir in yogurt/cream/nut paste and simmer to develop a creamy sauce.
Layer/cook the rice with the cooked gravy/meat, cover tightly and cook on low heat (dum) until rice is done.
Add spices, salt and adjust seasoning; cover and simmer until everything is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander, mint or fried onions as desired and serve hot.
Approx. cook time: 20-25 mins.

Heat oil/ghee in a large pan or pot over medium heat.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add the chicken and cook until it changes color/seals (for meat) or becomes tender (for vegetables).
Stir in yogurt/cream/nut paste and simmer to develop a creamy sauce.
Layer/cook the rice with the cooked gravy/meat, cover tightly and cook on low heat (dum) until rice is done.
Add spices, salt and adjust seasoning; cover and simmer until everything is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander, mint or fried onions as desired and serve hot.
Approx. cook time: 30-40 mins.

lunch.name: Arancini (Fried Rice Balls)
recipe: Rinse the rice until water runs clear and soak for 20-30 minutes.
Chop onions, tomatoes and other fresh ingredients as needed.
Heat oil/ghee in a large pan or pot over medium heat.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Drain the soaked rice and add it to the pot with measured water/broth; bring to a boil.
Layer/cook the rice with the cooked gravy/meat, cover tightly and cook on low heat (dum) until rice is done.
Add spices, salt and adjust seasoning; cover and simmer until everything is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander, mint or fried onions as desired and serve hot.
Approx. cook time: 15-20 mins.

breakfast.name: Khichdi (Rice and Lentil Porridge)
recipe: Rinse the rice until water runs clear and soak for 20-30 minutes.
Chop onions, tomatoes and other fresh ingredients as needed.
Heat oil/ghee in a large pan or pot over medium heat.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Drain the soaked rice and add it to the pot with measured water/broth; bring to a boil.
Layer/cook the rice with the cooked gravy/meat, cover tightly and cook on low heat (dum) until rice is done.
Add spices, salt and adjust seasoning; cover and simmer until everything is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander, mint or fried onions as desired and serve hot.
Approx. cook time: 25-35 mins.

Chop onions, tomatoes and other fresh ingredients as needed.
Heat oil/ghee in a large pan or pot over medium heat.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add the mutton and cook until it changes color/seals (for meat) or becomes tender (for vegetables).
Add spices, salt and adjust seasoning; cover and simmer until everything is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander, mint or fried onions as desired and serve hot.
Approx. cook time: 30+ mins (Reheat).

breakfast.name: Khichra
ingredients: Lentil, Wheat, Rice, Meat (Similar to Haleem)
recipe: Rinse the rice until water runs clear and soak for 20-30 minutes.
Chop onions, tomatoes and other fresh ingredients as needed.
Heat oil/ghee in a large pan or pot over medium heat.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Drain the soaked rice and add it to the pot with measured water/broth; bring to a boil.
Layer/cook the rice with the cooked gravy/meat, cover tightly and cook on low heat (dum) until rice is done.
Add spices, salt and adjust seasoning; cover and simmer until everything is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander, mint or fried onions as desired and serve hot.
Approx. cook time: 30+ mins (Reheat).

sides.name: Pathiri (Kerala Rice Roti)
recipe: Rinse the rice until water runs clear and soak for 20-30 minutes.
Chop onions, tomatoes and other fresh ingredients as needed.
Heat oil/ghee in a large pan or pot over medium heat.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Drain the soaked rice and add it to the pot with measured water/broth; bring to a boil.
Layer/cook the rice with the cooked gravy/meat, cover tightly and cook on low heat (dum) until rice is done.
Add spices, salt and adjust seasoning; cover and simmer until everything is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander, mint or fried onions as desired and serve hot.
Approx. cook time: 10-15 mins.
